mdRecord.dcterms:title: Law School Class of 1929
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Law School alumni. Identified (front row, left to right): James P. Hart, Jr. (second), Richard N. Crockett (third), F. D. G. Ribble, Class of 1921, third Dean of the School of Law [1939-1963] (sixth), Hardy C. Dillard, Class of 1927, fourth Dean of the School of Law [1963-1968] (seventh) and Frank L. Taylor (eighth). Second row, left to right: Homer W. Lynch (second), Thomas A. McEachern (fifth) and L. Mercer Smith (seventh). Third row: Roy W. Wheeler (center) and Willis W. Bohannon (right).
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
